description: Handles requests related to managing airline travel.

interface.description: Search for available flights based on the given criteria
interface.name: searchFlights

parameters.description: The IATA 3-letter code for the originating airport.
parameters.name: originAirport

parameters.description: The IATA 3-letter code for the destination airport.
parameters.name: destinationAirport

parameters.description: The earliest date and time for the flight in ISO8601 format.
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: The latest date and time for the flight in ISO8601 format.
parameters.name: endTime

parameters.description: The type of seat desired, e.g. 'First-Class', 'Economy Plus'
parameters.name: seatClassification

name: com.vantiq.trip.agents.FlightAgent
